name: When a task is completed it remains in the main list
scenarioId: classpath:features/cucumber/maintain_my_todo_list/completing_todos:When a task is completed it remains in the main list
methodName: When a task is completed it remains in the main list

testSteps.description: Given Jane has a todo list containing Buy some milk, Walk the dog

children.description: Jane starts with a todo list containing Buy some milk, Walk the dog
Jane adds the todo items called: [Buy some milk, Walk the dog]
Jane adds a todo item called: Buy some milk
Jane enters 'Buy some milk' then hits [RETURN] into 'What needs to be done?' field
Jane adds a todo item called: Walk the dog
Jane enters 'Walk the dog' then hits [RETURN] into 'What needs to be done?' field

testSteps.description: When she completes the task called "Walk the dog"

children.description: she completes the item called Walk the dog
she clicks on the complete item tick box

testSteps.description: Then her todo list should contain Buy some milk, Walk the dog

children.description: Then the items displayed should be ([Buy some milk, Walk the dog])

testSteps.description: But the "Walk the dog" task should be shown as Completed

children.description: she should see  that is equal to: <Completed>

userStory.narrative:
In order to make me feel **a sense of accomplishment**
  As a forgetful person
  I want to be to _view all of things I have completed_

title: When a task is completed it remains in the main list
